latex: Let $P$ be the number of ways to partition $2013$ into an ordered tuple of prime numbers.  What is $\log_2 (P)$?  If your answer is $A$ and the correct answer is $C$, then your score on this problem will be $\left\lfloor\frac{125}2\left(\min\left(\frac CA,\frac AC\right)-\frac35\right)\right\rfloor$ or zero, whichever is larger.
